title: Soba And Tofu In Ginger Broth
summary: Soban And Tofu In Ginger Broth might be a good recipe to expand your side dish collection. Watching your figure? This vegan recipe has 358 calories, 15g of protein, and 17g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 4 and costs $2.26 per serving. This recipe is liked by 7 foodies and cooks. It is brought to you by wholeliving.com. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 47 minutes. If you have snow peas, serrano chile, garlic cloves, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 58%, which is pretty good. Similar recipes are Soban and Tofu in Ginger Broth, Warm Soban in Broth with Spinach and Tofu, and Soba Noodles in Mushroom-Ginger Broth.
